alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Grant (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 4:22PM PDT until July 10 at 4:45PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM PDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL DOUGLAS AND WEST CENTRAL GRANT COUNTIES... At 422 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Lakeview, or 30 miles northwest of Moses Lake, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Palisades. This includes U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 175 and 176. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
